Desc.entry: Residential home with 7places which offers one-to-one support for adults aged over 18 years with a learning disability, challenging behaviour and autistic spectrum disorder. Each service user receives support based on an individual care plan designed to meet their needs and set goals which is regularly reviewed and updated. Service provided by Active Care Partnerships. Referral via social worker only. There is a charge for this service. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
